statements: SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis;
SELECT comment_id, user_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, post_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT comment_id, comment_text FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE post_id = 10 ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, AVG(sentiment_score) as avg_score FROM sentiment_analysis GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT comment_id, comment_text FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE user_id = 2 AND post_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, post_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM sentiment_analysis GROUP BY user_id, post_id HAVING avg_score > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users, COUNT(*) AS total_comments, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, post_id, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM sentiment_analysis GROUP BY user_id, post_id ORDER BY comment_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT comment_text, sentiment_score FROM comments ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT post_text, likes_count FROM posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_text, likes_count FROM posts WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT comment_text FROM comments WHERE post_id = 5 AND sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT comment_text, sentiment_score FROM comments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_text, likes_count FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_comments FROM comments GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_comments DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_text FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 100 AND post_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM comments;
SELECT comment_text, user_id, post_id FROM comments ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = 1001 AND post_id = 2002;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE comment_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT post_text FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT comment_text FROM comments WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, post_text FROM users JOIN posts ON user_id = 3 AND user_id = post_id;
SELECT * FROM user_comments;
SELECT comment_text, sentiment_score FROM user_comments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT comment_text FROM user_comments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM user_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2;
SELECT * FROM user_comments ORDER BY comment_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM user_comments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT analysis_result FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE comment_id IN (SELECT comment_id FROM user_comments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2) ORDER BY analysis_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM user_sentiments WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_comments) ORDER BY user_id ASC, sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM UserSentiments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM PostSentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM UserComments ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes_count, shares_count FROM PostStatistics WHERE likes_count > shares_count;
SELECT user_id, post_id, feedback_text FROM PostFeedback WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM UserSentiments;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM UserSentiments ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT comment, sentiment_score FROM UserSentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM PostSentiments JOIN UserComments ON PostSentiments.post_id = UserComments.post_id;
SELECT post_id, comments_count, likes_count, shares_count FROM PostStatistics ORDER BY comments_count DESC;
